overview_of_class:
A seminar course for graduate students featuring internal and external speakers and career-related topics.

This is a zero-credit required course. All MS and PhD students are required to complete three offerings of BMD_ENG 512, typically take in the fall, winter, and spring.

Speakers from a variety of BME-related fields will discuss ongoing research.
name: Grad Research Seminar in Biomedical Engg
title: MEAS BMD_ENG 512-0-20 Grad Research Seminar in Biomedical Engg
